title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Developing Self-regulated Explanation Strategies in Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and workplace data analysis experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners systematically apply self-regulated explanations during math problem-solving processes to improve conceptual understanding by over 30%.
Learners identify and correct misconceptions in mathematical concepts using self-regulated explanation strategies with over 80% accuracy.
Learners create self-regulated learning notes using digital tools in a blended environment and participate in peer feedback at 100%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
